WRITING.TEXT: They actually are orange, I'm not sure why the other guy said brown.

The second art will receive the damage buff and the lowered cooldown too, it's part of the melee combo. Fast Forward and Supreme Sword are really good for the conditions needed to activate them. Even though Fast Forward can be replaced by Secondary Accelerator if you have some basic control over Overdrive.

Per my understanding, a melee combo is simply stringing together two or more arts that are linked to your melee weapon in rapid succession. Of course, your art may have already been at 50% cooldown because of overdrive or some external factor. Granted, if you are in overdrive, you may want to consider Secondary Accelerator for better damage with essentially the same cooldowns (still insanely low). Assuming it wasn't due to an external factor, once the melee combo starts, any art used immediately afterward signals the end of the combo (ranged: buff or aura or offensive art), they will also be affected by fast forward, since they denote the end of the melee combo. Hope this helped!
